channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Brawl Taking Shape Over Pfizer's Multibillion-Dollar Heart Monopoly
item.description: The drugmaker’s fastest-growing blockbuster could soon face competition from two biotech firms in the treatment of a little-known heart condition.

item.title: Here's what Citi analysts are looking out for in Palantir's AI-focused conference
Falling Interest Rates May Be a Challenge for JPMorgan but Not for Everyone
item.description: Some banks may still see rising net interest income even if the Federal Reserve slashes rates as anticipated.

item.title: Boeing strike threat looms as workers vote on contract
Megamerger of European Banks Still Wouldn't Challenge Wall Street
item.description: A potential combination of Italy’s UniCredit with Germany’s Commerzbank would be big, but not big enough to create a European banking champion.

item.title: Lazard Reports August 2024 Assets Under Management
Investors Adopt Defensive Crouch Ahead of Fed Rate Cut
item.description: The utilities sector is neck and neck with tech as 2024’s best performing group.

item.title: US auto safety regulator opens probe into some VinFast cars
Private Markets Seem Out of Reach for Individual Investors. BlackRock Thinks It Has an Answer.
item.description: The asset manager is teaming up with Partners Group to offer wealthy investors a preset portfolio.

item.title: Exclusive-Evergrande Chairman Hui kept in special detention center in Shenzhen, sources say
